description: Listed building consent for refurbishment of the Albert Room drill hall including a new basement with links to Armoury House, and partial replacement of roof; demolition of outbuildings; alterations to the Sergeant's Cottage and Armoury House West Wing ground and mezzanine floors; construction of new single storey plus basement infill extension between Armoury House and Holmes Place Health Club.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  All new external and internal works and finishes and works of making good to the retained fabric, shall match the existing adjacent work with regard to the methods used and to material, colour, texture and profile, unless shown otherwise on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved or required by any condition(s) attached to this consent.

REASON:  In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building, in accordance with policies D22, D24 and D39 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
